original_text: Then he sent them out to tell people about the kingdom of God. He told them that they should also make sick people well again.
korean_text: 하나님의 나라를 전파하며 앓는 자를 고치게 하려고 내보내시며

sentences.original_text: to tell people about the kingdom of God
that they should also make sick people well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 또한 병자들을 다시 고쳐야 한다고
